question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: John cannot make a _______ to get married to Mary or stay single until he can afford a house and a car.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: She often drives very ________ so she rarely causes accident .

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: All Sue’s friends and __________ came to her party

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: My father studies about life and structure of plants and animals. He is a ………

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: She takes the …… for running the household.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: We are a very close-knit family and very ….. of one another.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: You are old enough to take _______ for what you have done.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: He has been very interested in doing research on _______ since he was at high school.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: Although they are twins, they have almost the same appearance but they are seldom in _______.

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: The more _______ and positive you look, the better you will feel.

question.title: Question: 11
question.questionText: My parents will have celebrated 30 years of _______ by next week.

question.title: Question: 12
question.questionText: London is home to people of many _______ cultures.

question.title: Question: 13
question.questionText: Some people are concerned with physical ______ when choosing a wife or husband.

question.title: Question: 14
question.questionText: Mrs. Pike was so angry that she made a _______ gesture at the driver.

question.title: Question: 15
question.questionText: She sent me a _______ letter thanking me for my invitation.

question.title: Question: 16
question.questionText: He is unhappy because of his _______.

question.title: Question: 17
question.questionText: His country has _______ climate.

question.title: Question: 18
question.questionText: She has a _______ for pink.

question.title: Question: 19
question.questionText: Computers are _______ used in schools and universities.

question.title: Question: 20
question.questionText: I sometimes do not feel _______ when I am at a party.

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: I wish he ……………. here now. (be)

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: She wishes you ……………. better. (feel)

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: I wish that you ……………. here yesterday. (be)

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: I wish he …………… his work tonight. (finish)

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: We wish you …………… tomorrow. (come)

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: She wishes she …………… the window last night. (open)

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: I wish you …………… earlier yesterday. (leave)

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: We wish they …………… with us last weekend. (come)

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: They wish he …………… with them the next day. (come)

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: They wish we …………… them some food yesterday. (give)

quiz.text: Used to, to be used to, get used to

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: I am………….milk every day.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: She has…………in a small village

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: When I was a child, I didn’t……………chocolate but now I eat a lot.

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: You must…………….English for long hours.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: I have……………….English everyday.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: I am……………for myself.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: Her son is…………television for five hours a day.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: I……………….a big chocolate cake a day but I stopped three years ago.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: I am…………..a cup of coffee in the morning.

question.title: Question: 10

question.title: Question : 1
question.questionText:
Far from killing the cinema industry, video film rental has revived the public’s interest in going to the cinema. As a result, multi-screen cinemas or multiple cinema complexes have appeared in the main towns. These cinemas can have up to 20 screens and show a great (1)______ (vary) of films. Renting films is an important (2)______ (time); in 1990 over 374 million video tapes were rented. People also buy tapes and presents. However, the (3) ______ (common) use of video recorders is to record programmes from the TV to watch at a more (4)______ (convenience) time. Far from encouraging (5)______ (excess) TV watching, video recorders have been used mainly to control the times at which people watch. This also (6)______ (contribution) to a decline in the number of hours of TV people watch, because they watch videos instead. During the 1980s, there was an enormous boom in the number of people buying video recorders, and shops (7)______ (expansion) to provide the video tapes they wanted. Video viewing became such a way of life, along with take-away food and an (8)______ (increase) interest in wine drinking, that the perfect night socialising at been has been (9)______ (joke) described as consisting of a video, a wine box, and a take-away curry. “Do you fancy coming over to my place to watch a video?” is a (10)______ (type) invitation.
Question (1)

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText:

Question (2)

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: I forgot to ________ my notes, so I had to improvise.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: Can you ________ me another beer?

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: We ________ all our bottles to be recycled.

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: He threatened to ________ them to court.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: Is it all right to ________ my dog?

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: I'll ________ this lot to the tip.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: I have to ________ my little brother to school.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: Did he ________ his new woman with him?

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: Can you ________ a salad? It's a potluck.

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: Robert asked the waiter to ________ him the check.

question.title: Question: 11
question.questionText: Remember to ________ your P.E. clothes to school.

question.title: Question: 12
question.questionText: ________ an umbrella, in case it rains.

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: We expect to take delivery of the aircraft ______ in June.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: ______ elapsed, when my attention was excited by the slow approach of an equipage.

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: His avant-garde music, ______ cousin to jazz, had limited appeal.

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: We've been waiting for quite ______ now.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: ______ there's a lot of competition between children for their mother's attention.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: Memories can ______ be pure fantasy, rather than actual recollections.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: ______ you sound just like my mum!

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: We'll take a vacation ______ in September.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: Peat is ______ used as a fertilizer.

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: He’s ________ excellent worker that he deserves to get promoted.

question.title: Question: 2

question.title: Question: 3

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: They had ________ terrible weather in Vinh that they came back in two days.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: It was ________ hot cup of coffee that I could not even touch my fingers outside of it.

question.title: Question: 6

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: Hilary Clinton is ________ to reign the US.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: She did not speak ________ for the audience to hear her.

question.questionText: She is ....... singer I’ve ever met.

question.questionText: It is ....... in the city than it is in the country.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: Her office is ....... away than mine.

question.questionText: He did the test ……… I did

question.title: Question: 11
question.questionText: My new sofa is ....... than the old one.

question.title: Question: 12
question.questionText: My sister dances ……… than me.

question.title: Question: 13
question.questionText: My bedroom is ....... room in my house.

question.title: Question: 14
question.questionText: This road is ....... than that road.

question.title: Question: 15
question.questionText: He drives …… his brother.

question.title: Question: 16
question.questionText: It was ....... day of the year.

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: Betty ______ the important question of who will be in charge.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: I'll ______ the subject when a suitable occasion offers itself.

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: Gas bubbles in any liquid tend to ______ to the surface .

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: The use of animals in scientific tests ______ difficult ethical questions.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: This incident ______ troubling questions.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: Hotel prices ______ during the peak season

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: The number of deaths has _____ to more than two dozen.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: His tactless remarks were enough to ______ anyone's hackles.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: We will now vote on the motion that membership charges should ______ by 15%.

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: Exercise ______ your body temperature.
